channel.title: Mail Experience Plus on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Mail Experience Plus on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: New and planned
item.description: New and planned Version 1.3.0.0 - 08.12.2023 New functions: Apps are now installed via a wizard instead of fully automatically. Version 1.2.0.0 - 30.10.2023 Corrections: Apps are now only installed once per database Version 1.1.0.0 - 19.01.2023 Mail Sender Plus replaced by Addressee Control. Version 1.0.0.0 Intelligent control of sender address per report via Mail Sender Plus Intelligent control of attachments at different levels via Mail Attachments Plus Intelligent control of subject line with placeholders via Mail Subject Plus

item.title: Working with Mail Experience Plus
item.description: Working with Mail Experience Plus The Connector 365 Mail Experience Plus app combines the 3 apps from our Mail Plus series into one power app. Below we provide information on how to use each area. Mail Subject Plus area The Mail Subject Plus area is there to add your own dynamic subject lines per report or customer to your emails. You can use placeholders to define your own content. Working with Subject
